CustomField.formula:
if(and ( RecordType.Name ="PFG", or( Data_Room_Access_Provided_auto__c=TRUE,
Contains(text(StageName),"4"), Contains(text(StageName),"5"), Contains(text(StageName),"6"), Contains(text(StageName),"7"), Contains(text(StageName),"8"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"4"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"5"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"6"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"7"))),1,0)
CustomField.label: PFG Data Room Access Provided
